flip_up_down.description: Flip the switch lever upwards and then downwards.

flip_down_up.description: Flip the switch lever downwards and then upwards.

rotate_lever_on.description: Turn the switch on by rotating the lever in the upward direction.

rotate_lever_off.description: Turn the switch off by rotating the lever in the downward direction.

activate_deactivate.description: Turn the switch on and then turn it off.

deactivate_activate.description: Turn the switch off and subsequently on.

switch_on.description: Switch on by rotating the lever upwards.

switch_off.description: Switch off by rotating the lever downwards.

activate_switch.description: Turn the switch on by rotating the lever.

deactivate_switch.description: Turn the switch off by rotating the lever in the opposite direction.

rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever to turn on or off the switch.

clean_frame.description: Clean the switch frame to get rid of dust and dirt.

polish_frame.description: Polish the switch frame for a shiny finish.

polish_switch_frame.description: Polish the switch frame to make it look shiny.

clean_switch_frame.description: Clean the switch frame to remove dust or any other particles.

routine_checkup.description: Flip the switch lever up, wipe the frame clean, then flip the lever down.

dust_n_flip.description: Dust off the switch frame and flip the lever up and down.

flip_n_clean.description: Flip the switch lever up and down and then wipe the frame clean.

maintenance_mode.description: Clean the switch frame, turn the switch off, then turn it on.

complete_cycle.description: Turn the switch on, clean the switch frame, then turn it off again.

activate_and_clean.description: Turn the switch on and then clean the switch frame.

deactivate_and_clean.description: Turn the switch off and then clean the switch frame.

switch_cycle.description: Switch on and then switch off.

maintenance.description: Clean the switch and then switch on.

total_cleanup.description: Switch off, clean the switch and then switch on.

activate_and_deactivate.description: Turn the switch on and subsequently off.

clean_and_activate.description: Clean the switch frame and turn the switch on.

clean_whole_switch.description: Clean the entire switch including the lever and switch frame.
